channel.title: Robert Spano on United-States-of-America.eu
channel.description: Recent content in Robert Spano on United-States-of-America.eu

item.title: Request for anonymity - European Court of Human Rights - McDonald’s RICO case
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original document: request_for_anonymity_2022-11-01_Redacted.pdf This request for anonymity was submitted to the European Court of Human Rights by fax to +33 390214350 on October 31, 2022, at 17:06:23 (GMT), or November 01, 2022, at 01:06 (am) Beijing time. My request for anonymity was approved by the European Court of Human Rights on November 02, 2022. However, I didn’t receive the notification by email they claim to have sent me on that day.

item.title: Request for interim measures - European Court of Human Rights - McDonald’s RICO case
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: request_for_interim_measures_2022-10-31_Redacted.pdf This request for interim measures was submitted to the European Court of Human Rights by fax to +33 390214350 on October 31, 2022, at 15:09:09 (GMT), or 23:09 Beijing time. Click on this link to visualize the original email: request_for_interim_measures_2022-10-31_Redacted.pdf To gain a clearer understanding of the sequence of events in this case, I invite you to view a detailed timeline at the following link:
